name: COLOR BOMB!
description:
COLOR BOMB!: Just a simple color-matching game.


How to Play:
Your mission in "COLOR BOMB!" is straightforward:

1. Observe and Remember: At the start of each wave, a variety of colors are displayed. Your first task? Memorize those colors!
2. Find the Missing Color: Pay attention to the color that doesn't appear in the current wave. Was green missing this time?
3. Time to Explode: Select the color that was absent in the previous wave and score points by blowing it up. If green was missing, bomb it! Utilize your memory.
4. Perfect Timing: Choosing the right color is essential, but timing is also crucial. Earn extra points by bombing the missing color at the exact right moment!

Features:
Dynamic Waves: Each wave introduces a new set of colors, keeping the game fresh and challenging.
Intuitive Gameplay: Simple yet addictive gameplay, easy to learn but hard to master.
Score Multipliers: Rewards for perfect timing. The better the timing, the higher the score.

Can you keep up with the ever-changing waves and bomb the correct color at the right time?
